name: Escape (itch)
description:
Hello, my name is Nicholas Martinez. This is actually my first ever game that I'm releasing to the public and I hope to continue on this path to becoming a great video game developer. As your playing this game, if there is anything you want to ask or notify me about, feel free to ask on the comment section here or on twitter ( https://twitter.com/QUICKALAS529 )

Credits

All sounds (except the step sound by heartbeast), art, and programming done by Nicholas Martinez, copyright 2016, all rights reserved.

*Special Thanks to Heartbeast and Shaun Spalding for their tutorials on GameMaker: Studio.

*Thank you to everyone on Twitter for supporting me through my first ever video game release.

I really do appreciate it. Here's to the start of the road of becoming an Indie Game Developer
